target.query:
from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.location =~ /^${location:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    (r.type == "temperature" and r._value > 30.0) or
    (r.type == "humidity" and r._value > 80.0) or
    (r.type == "co2" and r._value > 1000.0) or
    (r.type == "traffic_speed" and r._value > 80.0) or
    (r.type == "noise_level" and r._value > 85.0)
  )
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: count, createEmpty: false)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 0)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])

from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.location =~ /^${location:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    (r.type == "temperature" and r._value <= 30.0 and r._value > 28.0) or
    (r.type == "humidity" and r._value <= 80.0 and r._value > 75.0) or
    (r.type == "noise_level" and r._value <= 85.0 and r._value > 80.0)
  )
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 2m, fn: count, createEmpty: false)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._value > 0)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])

  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "Â°C")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.location =~ /^${location:regex}$/)
  |> group()
  |> mean()

  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_field"])

from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "Â°C")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.location =~ /^${location:regex}$/)
  |> group(columns: ["location"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r._time, _value: r._value, _field: r.location}))

from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "dB")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.location =~ /^${location:regex}$/)
  |> group(columns: ["location"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r._time, _value: r._value, _field: r.location}))

from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "Â°C")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.location =~ /^${location:regex}$/)
  |> group(columns: ["location"])
  |> mean()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: r._value, _field: "Temperature", location: r.location}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_field", "location"])
  |> yield(name: "temperature")

from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "%")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.location =~ /^${location:regex}$/)
  |> group(columns: ["location"])
  |> mean()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: r._value, _field: "Humidity", location: r.location}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_field", "location"])
  |> yield(name: "humidity")

from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "km/h")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.location =~ /^${location:regex}$/)
  |> group(columns: ["location"])
  |> mean()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: r._value, _field: "Traffic", location: r.location}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_field", "location"])
  |> yield(name: "traffic")

from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._field == "dB")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.location =~ /^${location:regex}$/)
  |> group(columns: ["location"])
  |> mean()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: r._value, _field: "Noise", location: r.location}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_field", "location"])
  |> yield(name: "noise")

data = from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.type =~ /^${sensor_type:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.location =~ /^${location:regex}$/)
  |> group(columns: ["sensorid", "location", "type"])

min_val = data |> min() |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: "Min"}))
max_val = data |> max() |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: "Max"}))
mean_val = data |> mean() |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: "Mean"}))
last_val = data |> last() |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _field: "Last"}))

union(tables: [min_val, max_val, mean_val, last_val])
  |> pivot(rowKey: ["sensorid", "location", "type"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
  |> keep(columns: ["sensorid", "location", "type", "Min", "Max", "Mean", "Last"])
  |> rename(columns: {sensorid: "Sensor", location: "Location", type: "Type"})
  |> sort(columns: ["Max"], desc: true)

from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.type =~ /^${sensor_type:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.location =~ /^${location:regex}$/)
  |> group()
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> keep(columns: ["_time", "_value"])

from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.type =~ /^${sensor_type:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.location =~ /^${location:regex}$/)
  |> group(columns: ["location", "type"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1m, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: r._time,
      _value: if (r.type == "temperature" and r._value > 30.0) or
                 (r.type == "humidity" and r._value > 80.0) or
                 (r.type == "co2" and r._value > 1000.0) or
                 (r.type == "traffic_speed" and r._value > 80.0) or
                 (r.type == "noise_level" and r._value > 85.0)
              then 1 else 0,
      _field: r.location + " - " + r.type
    }))

from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.location =~ /^${location:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) =>
    (r.type == "temperature" and r._value > 30.0) or
    (r.type == "humidity" and r._value > 80.0) or
    (r.type == "co2" and r._value > 1000.0) or
    (r.type == "traffic_speed" and r._value > 80.0) or
    (r.type == "noise_level" and r._value > 85.0)
  )
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      Time: string(v: r._time),
      Value: r._value,
      Unit: r._field,
      Sensor: r.sensorid,
      Location: r.location,
      Type: r.type
    }))
  |> sort(columns: ["Time"], desc: true)
  |> limit(n: 50)
  |> keep(columns: ["Time", "Value", "Unit", "Sensor", "Location", "Type"])

from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.type == "${sensor_type}")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.location =~ /^${location:regex}$/)
  |> group(columns: ["location"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r._time, _value: r._value, _field: r.location}))

from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.location == "${location}")
  |> group(columns: ["type"])
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: r._value, _field: r.type}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_field"])

from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.location == "${location}")
  |> group(columns: ["type"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_time: r._time, _value: r._value, _field: r.type}))

from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: -5m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.location =~ /^${location:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.type =~ /^${sensor_type:regex}$/)
  |> group(columns: ["sensorid", "location", "type", "_field"])
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      Sensor: r.sensorid,
      Location: r.location,
      Type: r.type,
      Unit: r._field,
      Value: r._value,
      _time: r._time
    }))
  |> keep(columns: ["Sensor", "Location", "Type", "Unit", "Value", "_time"])
  |> group()

from(bucket: "iot_bucket")
  |> range(start: -15m)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r._measurement == "sensors")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.location =~ /^${location:regex}$/)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r.type =~ /^${sensor_type:regex}$/)
  |> group(columns: ["location", "type"])
  |> count()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: r._value, _field: r.type, location: r.location}))
  |> keep(columns: ["_value", "_field", "location"])
